name: Dalian South East Coastal Trail
description: Get to know this 29.3-km point-to-point trail near Dalian Shi, Liaoning. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 8 h 7 min to complete. This is a popular trail for hiking, running, and walking, but you can still enjoy some solitude during quieter times of day.

name: Amber Bay
description: Get to know this 8.2-km out-and-back trail near Dalian Shi, Liaoning. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 2 h 16 min to complete. This trail is great for birding, hiking, and running, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Horse Mountain
description: Experience this 6.0-km out-and-back trail near Dalian Shi, Liaoning. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 1 h 37 min to complete. This trail is great for birding, hiking, and running, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Dandong Waterfront
description: Get to know this 5.6-km point-to-point trail near Dandong, Liaoning. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 1 h 11 min to complete. This trail is great for walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Hulu Island Beach Walk
description: Explore this 2.7-km out-and-back trail near Huludao, Liaoning. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 36 min to complete. This trail is great for birding, hiking, and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Fujiazhuang Park
description: Explore this 1.8-km loop trail near Dalian Shi, Liaoning. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 26 min to complete. This trail is great for hiking, road biking, and running, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Fenghuang Mountain
description: Try this 13.4-km loop trail near Dandong, Liaoning. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 6 h 39 min to complete. This trail is great for hiking and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.
